name: The Dying King
description:
The king is dying, as the sole heir you must prove your worth to him. Beware the king might not survive another minute, your decisions must be swift. There are many possible outcomes, but only one that leads to you succesfully inheriting the throne.

The game features a rich and immersive sound design and unique graphics.

Project management and development - Taavi Rannu (taavirannu99@gmail.com)

Graphics - Fruit (https://twitter.com/FruitlegsWorks)

Story - Anna-Maria Ninnas (am.ninnas@gmail.com, https://www.linkedin.com/in/ninnas)

Sound - Esuriens (https://soundcloud.com/esurialis)

Contributor - Jaagup Tomingas
